__e: I need to pop by'n see Poirot on the way, he is feeling a bit poorly, so I am handling the case, though we must keep him informed.
For the majority it would have been the sufficient thing, but for the Poirot not.
Only because the solution of a crime it is simple, Poirot, it does not mean what is missed.
The solving of the murder is of, too often, the work of Poirot.
But Poirot, you know he is immortal. And what is more, he knows everything.
But they also say that Poirot is so intelligent he is scarcely human.
